name: Hyperlight Survivor
description:
Step into the relentless chaos of deep space warfare in "Hyperlight Survivor", a Competitive Bullet Hell with roguelite mechanics. Brace yourself as you become the ultimate Champion, fighting against an endless horde of enemies determined to destroy your spaceship.

Survive

Pilot your spaceship through a series of ever-changing arena, the longer you survive, the more challenging the battle become!

Rank Up

Complete contracts to reach higher ranks, but if you fail, you will lose your Rank Score and derank!

Unleash Your Arsenal

Unlock new powerful spaceships, each with its own unique playstyle and Ultra. There are no limits to the weapons and Power-Ups you can acquire so enhance your ship and unleash the true power of your arsenal!

Twist The Arena

Pick a Random Arena Box and watch the battlefield change. Deadly turrets and moving spikes will make your survival more challenging!
